snippet: A solar-powered plane trying to circle the globe without a drop of fuel made an unscheduled landing late Monday in Japan to wait out bad weather.
abstract: Solar-powered plane Solar Impulse 2 makes unplanned stop in Japan to wait out bad weather during attempt to circle globe using no fuel.
lead_paragraph: A solar-powered plane trying to circle the globe without a drop of fuel made an unscheduled landing late Monday in Japan to wait out bad weather.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Japan: Weather Halts Solar Plane
